text: Doctor Aybolit () is a 1938 Soviet family movie directed by Vladimir Nemolyayev.Доктор АйболитИз интердевочки – в дизайнеры. Резкие зигзаги судьбы Анастасии Немоляевой It stars Maksim Shtraukh, Anna Semionovna, and Igor Arkadin. == Actors == * Maksim Shtraukh as Dr. Aibolit * Anna Semionovna as Varvara (as A. Vilyams) * Igor Arkadin as Benalis * Yevgeni Gurov * Aleksandr Timontayev as Robber == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1938 movies Category:Soviet family movies
title: Doctor Aybolit (movie)
